hooks.command: node -e "const path = process.argv[1]; if (path.endsWith('.ts') || path.endsWith('.tsx') || path.endsWith('.js') || path.endsWith('.jsx')) { const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { execSync(`npx prettier --write "${path}"`, { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch (e) { console.warn('Prettier failed:', e.message); } }" "${file_path}"
